content: yolanda by rose williams simple as abc supplies 400 yards fingering weight yarn #5 needle stitch markers abbreviations k = knit k2tog = knit two stitches together yo = yarn over kfb=knit into the front and back of stitch pm = place marker sm = slip marker gauge 18 stitches and 22 row = 4 stockinette and unblocked size 24 neck opening cast on 3 stitches using your favorite method set up row *kfb kfb pm k1 *knit all stitches garter section increases on both edges on right sides only 1 kfb k to 1 st before marker kfb sm k1 2 knit all stitches 3 kfb k to 1 st before marker kfb sm k1 4 knit all stitches 5 kfb k to 1 st before marker kfb sm k1 6 knit all stitches 7 kfb k to 1 st before marker kfb sm k1 8 knit all stitches 9 kfb k to 1 st before marker kfb sm k1 10 knit all stitches 15 stitches eyelet section increases on both edges on right sides only 1 kfb *yo k2tog repeat from * to 1 st before marker kfb sm k1 2 k3 purl to end of row 3 kfb *yo k2tog repeat from * to 1 st before marker kfb sm k1 4 k3 purl to end of row 5 kfb *yo k2tog repeat from * to 1 st before marker kfb sm k1 6 k3 purl to end of row 7 kfb *yo k2tog repeat from * to 1 st before marker kfb sm k1 8 k3 purl to end of row 9 kfb *yo k2tog repeat from * to 1 st before marker kfb sm k1 10 k3 purl to end of row remove marker 25 stitches repeat garter section and eyelet section once more repeat garter section only once more 55 stitches eyelet section increases on one edge 1 k3 straight edge *k2tog yo repeat from * to last 2 sts kfb k1 increase edge 2 k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 3 k3 *k2tog yo repeat from * to last 3 sts kfb k2 4 k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 5 k3 *k2tog yo repeat from * to last 2 sts kfb k1 6 k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 7 k3 *k2tog yo repeat from * to last 3 sts kfb k2 8 k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 9 k3 *k2tog yo repeat from * to last 2 sts kfb k1 10 k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 garter section increases on one edge 1 k to last 2 sts kfb k1 2 knit all stitches 3 k to last 2 sts kfb k1 4 knit all stitches 5 k to last 2 sts kfb k1 6 knit all stitches 7 k to last 2 sts kfb k1 8 knit all stitches 9 k to last 2 sts kfb k1 10 knit all stitches repeat eyelet and garter increase sections a total of 5 times then
